name: DevRun!
description:
Escape from your collapsing reign! In the time of middle ages, you were a king who did not care about his people. The day had come and your people decided to overthrow you. You must escape from your people and your kingdom!

Key Bindings

-Use the right and left arrows or the A, and D keys on your keyboard to run.

-Use the spacebar to jump.

-Use ESC or the pause button to pause your game.

-Use R or the restart button to restart your game.

-Use the up arrow key or W to climb up, and the down arrow key or S to climb down from ladders.

Developer - Furkan Safa Altunyuva
